meanings.sent1: Math is a learnable subject for students of all ages.
meanings.sent2: The new language was very learnable with daily practice.
meanings.sent3: The dog found it learnable to fetch the ball after a few tries.
meanings.sent4: The concept of gravity is as learnable as the falling leaves in autumn.
meanings.sent5: The dance routine was made learnable by breaking it down into simple steps.

meanings.definition: Able to be acquired or understood through study or practice.
meanings.sent1: The skill was easily learnable with the help of a tutor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe was so learnable that even beginners could follow it.
meanings.sent3: The robot found it learnable to perform tasks after programming.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the universe are as learnable as the constellations in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The history lesson became more learnable with interactive activities.
